amendment.description: To rename and modify the authorities relating to the Inspector General of the Coalition Provisional Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3288 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3288 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7086-7088; text as modified: CR S7086-7087) To rename and modify the authorities relating to the Inspector General of the Coalition Provisional Authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3288 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3288 proposed by Senator Feingold.
